structure.unit: COUNTIES, CITIES, AND OTHER LOCAL UNITS

law.text: Bonds for improvements authorized by the provisions of KRS 67A.710 to 67A.825 may be caused to mature as to principal in term or serial maturities not to exceed twenty (20) years from date of issue.
law.history: Created 1974 Ky. Acts ch. 394, sec. 3, effective June 21, 1974.
